usecases

Class ItemManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • usecases.ItemManager

  • public class ItemManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ItemManager is a use case for Item. IdToItem is a hashmap storing Id as key and Item as value

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ItemManager(java.util.List<entities.Item> allItems)
      Create an ItemManager with given Items
